sentence.Network_en: It is an axiom in cultural evolution that technologies once invented are never uninvented.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个文明演进的公理:已经发明的技术就再也不能当作从未发明过.

auth_sentence.content: But the after effect should dissuade all but lunatics. Nuclear weaponry cannot not be uninvented.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the after effect should dissuade all but lunatics. Nuclear weaponry cannot not be uninvented.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the after effect should dissuade all but lunatics. Nuclear weaponry cannot not be uninvented.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
